Example datasets
====================

Here are the datasets we used in this paper:

| Dataset    | Reference    | Original source      |
|------------|------------|--------------|
| Cell Lines      | Zheng et al.      | https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/datasets/1.1.0/jurkat <br>https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/datasets/1.1.0/293t <br>https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/datasets/1.1.0/jurkat:293t_50:50 |
| Pancreas     | Gr√ºn et al.<br>Muraro et al.<br>Lawlor et al.<br>Baron et al.<br>Wang et al.| https://github.com/satijalab/seurat-data|
| PBMC 3&68K      | 10X-Genomics<br> Zheng et al.| https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/datasets/1.1.0/pbmc3k<br>https://www.10xgenomics.com/resources/datasets/fresh-68-k-pbm-cs-donor-a-1-standard-1-1-0 |
| MHSP     | Paul et al. <br> Nestorowa et al.| https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE72857 <br>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE81682|
| Mouse Cell Atlas    | Han et al. <br>the Tabula Muris Consortium| https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE108097<br>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE109774|
| Human PBMC      | Zheng et al.| https://support.10xgenomics.com/singlecell-gene-expression/datasets/2.1.0/pbmc8k<br>https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-vdj/datasets/2.2.0/vdj_v1_hs_pbmc_5gex|
| Mouse Retina     | Shekhar et al. <br>Macosko et al.| https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE81905 <br>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE63473|
| Human Cell Atlas    | Regev A., et al.| https://s3.amazonaws.com/preview-ica-expression-data/ica_cord_blood_h5.h5 <br> https://s3.amazonaws.com/preview-ica-expression-data/ica_bone_marrow_h5.h5|
| Mouse Brain     | Saunders et al. <br>Rosenberg et al.|http://dropviz.org/<br>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSM3017261|
| CRC    | Zhang et al.| https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE146771 |
| Lung    | Vieira Braga et al.| https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.12420968|
